meaningMnemonic: <radical>Flowers</radical> that you <radical>oversee</radical> are always <kanji>indigo</kanji>. You aren't sure why though...
readingMnemonic: Wait, maybe these flowers are only <kanji>indigo</kanji> because there is something wrong with your <reading>eye</reading>s (あい)! Maybe your eyes are indigo and that's why it's all you see!
